Posts.Content: I'm Gabriella. I'm so sorry to read of your anxiety, yet at the same time, it's wonderful for you to feel a sense of community here and the fact that you are being offered some valuable advice and first-hand experiences from others. This network is extremely positive and I feel the love all around - and it is very much appreciated. Searching out the latest & best drugs & treatments is obviously what you are doing and I wuold be diong the same. The main goal, to stop the blood flow to the cancer cells, oxygenate and nourish the body so as to achieve a the best possible outcome. Please never hesitate to contact me, as I may beable to offer you support with regard integrative medical, alternative, or emotional & spiritual support - I'm here for you, as are so many others. With respect, peace & many blessings to you, your family andyour home. Keep the faith. There is more than just continued battle in most cases. Gabriella ~~~~~~
Posts.Title: my Mom Has Breast Cancer and it Has Spread to Her Spine
